ЁЯРШ
Mahamall (Great Wrestler)

The greatest ruler of the Pallava dynasty. 'Mahamall' means 'great wrestler'. The city of 'Mamallapuram' (Mahabalipuram) was named after him.

тЪФя╕П
Vatapikonda

He avenged his father's defeat by defeating and killing Pulakeshin II in 642 CE. He captured the Chalukya capital Vatapi and took the title 'Vatapikonda' (Conqueror of Vatapi).

ЁЯЪв
Sri Lankan Expedition

Sent naval expeditions twice to reinstate his friend, Sri Lankan prince Manavamma, on the throne.

ЁЯУМ
Important Facts (Exam Points)
  • Hsuan Tsang: The Chinese traveler Hsuan Tsang (around 640 CE) visited Kanchipuram and described it as a major center of learning.
  • Architecture: The famous 'Ekasma Rathas' (Monolithic Rathas) or 'Pancha Pandava Rathas' of Mahabalipuram were built by him.
